objectives.en: The course aims to give an overview how to communicate with the media should the need arise; to create awareness of different options in which this situation may occur; to help understand the case from the journalist's point of view.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on anda ülevaade sellest,  kuidas suhelda meediaga, kui selleks peaks vajadus tekkima. On teadlik erinevatest variantidest, millisel juhul selline olukord ette võib tulla. Oskab näha juhtumit ka ajakirjaniku poolelt vaadates.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows the general principles of how to communicate with the media;
2) has an overview of which channels and why are best for the source or the journalist;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) omab ülevaadet, millised kanalid on parimad allikale ja millised ajakirjanikule ning miks see nii on;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) knows the differences and similarities between a newspaper and a website;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) tunneb ajalehe ja veebilehe erinevusi ja sarnasusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) has an overview of what are the expectations of the media;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) omab ülevaadet, mida meedia tavainimeselt "tahta võib";

learning_outcomes.en: 5) has an overview of what kind of politicians journalists are afraid to interview and why;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) omab ülevaadet, milliseid poliitikuid ajakirjanikud intervjueerida kardavad ja miks;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) knows how to find and write news and what questions the story must answer;
learning_outcomes.et: 6) teab, kuidas leida ja kirja panna uudist ning millistele küsimustele peab lugu vastuse andma;

learning_outcomes.en: 7) has an overview of how to make/select a photo for a story;
learning_outcomes.et: 7) omab ülevaadet, kuidas teha/valida loo juurde fotot;

learning_outcomes.en: 8) knows what else is needed for the story to engage the reader.
learning_outcomes.et: 8) teab, mida on loo juurde veel tarvis, et see lugejat köidaks.
